mapper.insert: insert into cs_order_item (GUID, ORDER_GUID, ORGAN_CODE, CONTACT, CONTACT_PHONE, ITEM_GUID, ITEM_TYPE, PRICE, NUMBER, AMOUNT, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_NAME, COUNTY_NAME, ADDRESS, SERVICE_FEE, SERVICE_DATE, SERVICE_TIME, ALLOT_TYPE, SERVICE_PERSON, REMARK, SEND_TIME, START_TIME, COMPLETE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER) values (#{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allotType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{servicePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{completeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
